actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that any parent who kidnaps his minor child shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned for not more than 1 year, or both.

summary.text: Provides that any parent who kidnaps his minor child shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned for not more than one year, or both. (Amends 18 U.S.C. 120).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that any parent who kidnaps his minor child shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned for not more than 1 year, or both.
